overview: Super bottom Scott Hunter, known globally as the muscle man power bottom with one of the most handsome faces in the business. 100% British, Scott embodies what it is to be a beefcake who loves dick, and boy does he know how to take it! From kitchen counter fucking with Damien Crosse to outdoor action with American hunk Tom Wolfe, Scott might be discerning with his co-stars, but that leads to a scorching hot scene for us all to sit back and watch over and over!
title: The Best of Scott Hunter
